title: Erdős Problem #1
description: If ... with ... is such that the subset sums ... are distinct for all ... then\[N \gg 2^{n}.\]

overview.historicalContext: Erdős Problem #1 from erdosproblems.com. Originally offered with a prize of $500.
overview.problemStatement: If $A\subseteq \{1,\ldots,N\}$ with $\lvert A\rvert=n$ is such that the subset sums $\sum_{a\in S}a$ are distinct for all $S\subseteq A$ then\[N \gg 2^{n}.\]
